description.value: Just your luck, your meat is just the right amount of tender and you give off an appealing scent to predators. Enemies with a bite or bite-like attack within 15 feet of you or their scent range, whichever is farther, become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} so long as they remain there, possibly drooling a bit in the process.

source.value: Ponyfinder: Races of Everglow Second Edition
